languages.text: "Что-то мне подсказывает, что ты специально оставил инфопластину на видном месте. Для меня".
"Something tells me you left the data-slate in a conspicuous place on purpose. You left it there for me."
languages.original_text: "Что-то мне подсказывает, что ты специально оставил инфопластину на видном месте. Для меня".

traits.locale_text: "Something tells me you left the data-slate in a conspicuous place on purpose. You left it for me."
"Something tells me you left the data-slate in a conspicuous place on purpose. You left it for me."
"Something tells me you left the data-slate in a conspicuous place on purpose. You left it there for me."
"Something tells me you left the data-slate in a conspicuous place on purpose. You left it there for me."
"Something tells me you left the data-slate in a conspicuous place on purpose. You left it there for me."
"Something tells me you left the data-slate in a conspicuous place on purpose. You left it there for me."

languages.text: 「何となくだけど、君はあのデータスレートをわざと目立つ場所に置いたんじゃないかと思う。{mf|俺|私}のために、そこに残したんだろう」
languages.original_text: "Something tells me you left the data-slate in a conspicuous place on purpose. You left it there for me."

traits.locale_text: 「何となくだけど、君はあのデータスレートをわざと目立つ場所に置いたんじゃないかと思う。{mf|俺|私}のために、そこに残したんだろう」

languages.text: "Ich habe das Gefühl, Ihr habt den Datablock absichtlich an einer so auffälligen Stelle platziert. Ihr habt ihn für mich dort hingelegt."
languages.original_text: "Something tells me you left the data-slate in a conspicuous place on purpose. You left it there for me."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe das Gefühl, Ihr habt den Datablock absichtlich an einer so auffälligen Stelle platziert. Ihr habt ihn für mich dort hingelegt."

languages.text: « Quelque chose me dit que vous avez volontairement laissé cette plaque de données en évidence. Vous vouliez que je la trouve. »
languages.original_text: "Something tells me you left the data-slate in a conspicuous place on purpose. You left it there for me."

traits.locale_text: « Quelque chose me dit que vous avez volontairement laissé cette plaque de données en évidence. Vous vouliez que je la trouve. »

languages.text: «Algo me dice que se dejó la tablilla de datos a la vista deliberadamente. Vamos, para que yo la encontrase».
languages.original_text: "Something tells me you left the data-slate in a conspicuous place on purpose. You left it there for me."

traits.locale_text: «Algo me dice que se dejó la tablilla de datos a la vista deliberadamente. Vamos, para que yo la encontrase».

languages.text: “在我看来，你是有意把你的数据板留在那么显眼的地方，目的就是为了让我看到。”
languages.original_text: "Something tells me you left the data-slate in a conspicuous place on purpose. You left it there for me."

traits.locale_text: “在我看来，你是有意把你的数据板留在那么显眼的地方，目的就是为了让我看到。”

languages.text: "İçimden bir ses, databelayı bilerek göze çarpacak bir yere bıraktığını söylüyor. Benim görmem için oraya bıraktın."
languages.original_text: "Something tells me you left the data-slate in a conspicuous place on purpose. You left it there for me."

traits.locale_text: "İçimden bir ses, databelayı bilerek göze çarpacak bir yere bıraktığını söylüyor. Benim görmem için oraya bıraktın."
